name: SAVE THE DINOS!
description:
SAVE THE DINOS!

Fierce meteorites hail down on Dino Land and the Dinos need to repopulate quickly before they all go down in history.

CONTROLS

1. Click meteorites to shoot them with your laser

2. Click Dinos to make them dash in their opposite direction

3. Spacebar = pause/play

Made by me in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46.

Website: https://marcusnystrand.se/

Thanks to my friend Morgan who apparently is very good at making dinosaur sounds. Also thanks to my other friends who tested the game!

CHANGELOG
1.1 Fixed bug where players can shoot meteors while game is paused
1.0 Ludum Dare edition
